reviewText: Very poor version, it spears almost a home made copy. It froze several times I had to manually advance the film, so this was a major disappointment.

This is a new version after the white and black version with the same actor Fernando Soler and it is remarkable ! We find some other actors like Amparo Rivelles, Blanca Snchez, Domingo Soler and Alberto Vzquez whom sings a song that has make taken off his career. Very good Mexican film. This familiar drama will move the audience.
